net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.collisions
Class Hitbox

java.lang.Object
  net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.collisions.Hitbox
Direct Known Subclasses:
NoHitbox, RectHitbox
public abstract class Hitbox
extends java.lang.Object

Something that can collide and be possessed by physical objects. Isn't it wonderful?

Method Detail

isColliding

public abstract CollisionResult isColliding(Hitbox other)
Decide if this hitbox collides with the other hitbox via any means necessary. This should most likely be heavily optimized, as every event on the map will be spewing these at each other. And in an exponential fashion.

Parameters:
other - The shape we *may* be colliding with
Returns:
The result of the collision test

isCollidingRect

public abstract CollisionResult isCollidingRect(RectHitbox other)
Double-dispatch: collision detection for rectangles.

Parameters:
other - The rect to chekc against
Returns:
The result of the collision test
